attributes.action: Stop adding Sodium Fluorides to our drinking water!
attributes.additional_details: Fluoride was used in camps in the WW2 by the Nazis to gain more control by suppressing peoples minds and thoughts, Why is it still being added to our water supplies? This isnt Nazi nation!!!
attributes.background: I for one drink alot of water every day and i do not wish for fluorides to be added to the water supplies! It is a poison to mine and anyone elses bodies and minds and it should be stopped!!
